Text:
Thanks for the upload!

For the english speaking people:

iso 1 en iso 2 DO have english subs (at least: in VLC i can choose them)

Iso 3 is portugese language and english language with only portugese subs

iso 4 is indeed (only) english language though listed as portugese, only portugese subs.

SO.... if you only understand english, skip dvd 3, for the rest, you're good.
great upload alemao99, but please seed
